message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down a bit to $125. It's a very good price for this product. What do you say?
I'm not sure I can go any higher than $115. Can you meet me at that price?
